dmca.title: Copyright Infrindgement Claim
dmca.body:
Dear Madam/Sir,

Although Fabio Marchi has removed all and any copyright notices of the WSCraft
software, you can still see that the entire Website is managed by the WSCraft CMS.
WSCraft has a system file that enables identifying our software. 

This is confidential information. 
Please DO NOT share this information with Fabio Marchi as it may affect our
intellectual rights.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Please try to enter the following link in the browser address bar: 

http://www.hsantamonica.com.br/site/dir_sistema/ssi/global4/interface.inc.php?wp=1

You will see the Powered by WSCraft logo. We believe this information proves our
claim. 

Please disable access to this Website.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Thank you,
Jeff Masycheff
Global Account Manager
Website: http://www.wscraft.com
E-mail: jeff@wscraft.com
Phone: +972 8 931 9357




  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Copyright 
  To: jeff@wscraft.com 
  Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org 
  Sent: Thursday, April 05, 2007 4:56 PM
  Subject: FW: FW: Copyright Infrindgement Claim


  We are unable to locate on the web page www.hsantamonica.com.br  any of
  the material that you claim is being infringed as of 9:56:32 a.m.
  (GMT-6).

  Legal Response Team
  ThePlanet.com
   
  > From: Jeff Masycheff [mailto:jeff@wscraft.com] 
  > Sent: Wednesday, April 04, 2007 5:13 AM
  > To: Copyright
  > Subject: Copyright Infrindgement Claim
  > 
  >  
  > 
  > Dear Mr. Almeida,
  > 
  >  
  > 
  > We detected on the second time illegal use of our software product,
  > WSCraft content management system, by one of your clients on
  > http://www.hsantamonica.com.br  (IP: 67.15.12.81). 
  > 
  >  
  > 
  > The Website is designed and being managed by Fabio Marchi who uses the
  > WSCraft software for developing and maintaining this Website.
  > 
  > We have a good faith belief that use of the WSCraft software by Fabio
  > Marchi is not authorized because:
  > 
  >  
  > 
  > 1. Fabio Marchi is not a registered holder of the WSCraft license. 
  > 2. We have evidences that WSCraft software is currently being used
  > on http://www.hsantamonica.com.br
  > 3. http://www.hsantamonica.com.br has been never registered in our
  > users database as a Website that is authorized to use the WSCraft
  > software.
  > 4. We have evidences that the names of the WSCraft original .php
  > files have been changed to prevent us from identification of illegal
  > use.
  > 
  >  
  > 
  > We are ready to provide the evidences that Fabio Marchi is illegally
  > using the WSCraft software by your request.
  > 
  > 
  > As Mr. Marchi violates both your terms of service and international
  laws
  > on copyright, we demand to initiate investigation on this issue and
  > delete all the WSCraft CMS files from the account of this client.  We
  > are ready to provide you with all necessary evidences. 
  > 
  > 
  > This is also the matter of your professional reliability to not
  provide
  > technological support to those users who ignore laws and infringe
  > intellectual rights. 
  > 
  > 
  > I will highly appreciate if you keep me informed about results of your
  > investigation.
  > 
  >  
  > 
  > We ensure that information in this notification is accurate and I,
  Jeff
  > Masycheff, a Global Account Manager is authorized to act on behalf of
  > the owner of an exclusive right that is infringed. 
  > 
  >  
  > 
  > Please find the claim prepared on the company's letterhead with my
  > signature attached.
  > 
  >  
  > 
  > Thank you,
  > 
  > Jeff Masycheff
  > 
  > Global Account Manager
  > 
  > Website: http://www.wscraft.com
  > 
  > E-mail: jeff@wscraft.com
  > 
  > Phone: +972 8 931 9357
  > 

  * Garrett <gwhite@theplanet.com>
  * 0x067C2882(L)
